description: This is my personal story as a heart patient seeking solutions to the high cost of cardiac measurement equipment or the lack of features I was interested in. From this desire the OpenHolter project was born: a Do-It-Yourself electro cardiogram and cardiac recorder that can be built with off the shelf parts and uses Django for heart sinus waveform analysis.
title: The OpenHolter project: DIY Cardiometry with Arduino and Django.
